action.action-desc: Mr. Bacon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the President to grant a certain retired grade to the Director of Admissions of a Service Academy.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Military Service Academy Director of Admissions Act of 2023.

section.header: Retired grade for the Director of Admissions of a Service Academy

subsection.text: Section 7342 of title 10, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting , or the Director of Admissions, before of the United States Military Academy; and
by striking as such a professor and inserting in such position.

subsection.text: Section 8470a(a) of title 10, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by inserting and subject to paragraph (3), after subsection (b),; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

Upon retirement, an officer of the Navy or Marine Corps serving as a permanent professor, or the Director of Admissions, of the United States Naval Academy in the grade of captain or colonel, and whose service in such position has been long and distinguished, may, in the discretion of the President, be retired in the grade of rear admiral (lower half) or brigadier general.

subsection.text: Section 9342 of title 10, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting , or the Director of Admissions, before of the United States Air Force Academy; and
by striking as such a professor and inserting in such position.
